channel.title: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!"

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I never had any trouble getting the reaper allies. Hermano and Fletch were always first try grabs for me. However, that little bugger Timmy never levelled up on the first try. Was always like 15-20. Billy level 3 was a different matter. And lucky sevens took me 170k to get.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: It's to bad that themes almost impossible to get.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: i recommend lucky seven theme

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: well i was able to get get Fletch at the first try(real lucky) but now i'm trying to get hermano but not only he refuses to pop up but i can only get his quest 1-2 times a day =(

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I did general missions for the +2000 ryo in some missions and the timmy mission popped up really often, just didn't wanna level

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I have been doing Gen missions solidly for a week with MC stripey and Timmy and Shorty. I 've done the plushie mission now over 40 times successfully but no Fletch. I am getting very very very irked.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: Kamaitatchi why were u trying to get timmy lvl 2 from general missions? u can get him in taijutsu specific missionsâ€¦

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I did Ichi Special Ramen, MC Stripeypants, and WhiteEye, and nailed him on the first try.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded:
TC, you're probably just horribly unlucky, like the most of us. :P
However, I never really had a problem getting Fletch; I got him on around the sixth or seventh mission attempt with MC Stripeypants in mah parteh. The chances of finding Fletch are incredibly low, and MC Stripeypants doesn't improve it by much.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I believe so.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: Does Stripey add to the odds of getting allies as well as items?

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I got Fletch really fast, after 3 tries or so. Only Hermano took really long, more than a week before his mission even popped up : (. I was doing general mission tough, going for Timmy lv2 at the same time

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I got the mission roughly 5x a day. Sometimes 2-3 back to back. I was running GEN only missions.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: Wow, I guess I had it easy compared to you guys. I wound up getting him on my 12th attempt, which only took me 3 days.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: If its possible in your village you may want to use a Monochrome Pheromone which will cause a reaper on your next mission to appear. It requires advanced gathered stuff, so you need a Science workshop and a potion palace.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I used the Ichi Special Ramen got the mission 5 times but of course Fletch didn't pop up >.< !

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: So how often did you get the mission because I also been running strait Gen missions and over the last 2 days Ive had it once

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: Here's my two cents. I got him after 35 successful attempts at this mission, with stripey in my group. 35!!! I ran exclusively gen missions for over a week.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: Just thought I'd put my 2 cents in I been using MC and its still taking a while to get him

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I'm in the same boat, it must just have a very low chance.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: Probably just unlucky. Though, my luck with reaper mission has been very bad as well lately.

item.title: Reaper Mission: A-Level! Sew Together a Plushie!
item.content:encoded: I've passed this mission 8 times now with MC Stripeypants in my party and using the Whiteyes jutsu, and I still haven't gotten Fletch. Is the chance of getting him extremely low or something, or am I just unlucky?
